sentence.Network_en: Marine volcanics of Early Ordovician was found in Zhifang region.

sentence.Network_en: This was the result from the large - scale regression in the Late Ordovician.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是晚奥陶世晚期大规模海退的结果.

sentence.Network_en: The Cambrian - Ordovician strata in Luxi Block are very continuous and well exposed.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲁西地块的寒武 - 奥陶纪地层出露连续,露头较好.
